body.p: To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin Governor of The Commonwealth of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Caldwell County Kentucky have long Known Thomas B Wadlington & he has Ever been considered a good & true hearted Citizen Known & noted for his industry & his oderly conduct -- The Difficulty in which he was engaged with Milton A Cartwright did not appear to us to be of his seeking, nor are we satisfied that the case was presented to the Jury as it really occurred -- We hope yr Excellency will review the Case and give the poor man the benefit of Every doubt &and we desire, that his case may be judged in mercy & regarded with favor, & That Yr Excellency will take into consideration Every circumstance that ought to opperate in his behalf and we desire that yr excellency may & will be persuaded that it is consistent with yr duty to Extend to him the executive clemency & that his life may be sparred either by a full pardon or by a commutation of his punishment

Yrs Respy
Jany 21st 1861
